data.name: ErrorCannotMatchMembership
data.value: The user information you entered is valid but you don't have access to this site.

data.name: ErrorCannotValidate
data.value: There was a problem with the username/password you entered.

data.name: ErrorDuplicateEmail
data.value: A user name for that email address already exists. Please enter a different email address.

data.name: ErrorDuplicateUserName
data.value: User name already exists. Please enter a different user name.

data.name: ErrorGeneric
data.value: An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: ErrorInvalidAnswer
data.value: The password retrieval answer provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: ErrorInvalidEmail
data.value: The email address provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: ErrorInvalidPassword
data.value: The password provided is invalid. Passwords must be at least 6 characters long, with at least one non-alphanumeric character.

data.name: ErrorInvalidQuestion
data.value: The password retrieval question provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: ErrorInvalidUserName
data.value: The user name provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: ErrorPasswordMatch
data.value: The new password and confirmation password do not match.

data.name: ErrorProviderError
data.value: The authentication provider returned an error. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: ErrorUserRejected
data.value: The user creation request has been canceled. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.value: Confirm Password

data.value: New Password

data.value: Logout

data.name: ChangePasswordText
data.value: Use the form below to change your password. New passwords are required to be a minimum of {0} characters in length.

data.name: PasswordChangedText
data.value: Your password has been changed successfully.

data.name: ErrorSavingPassword
data.value: An error occurred saving the password.

data.name: ErrorOldPassword
data.value: The current password you entered is not correct.

data.name: ForgotPasswordText
data.value: If you've forgotten your password, a link to create a new one can be sent to the email address for your account. Just enter your username and click the `Send Email` button below.

data.name: ForgotPasswordEmailSentText
data.value: A link to reset the password for this account has been sent to the associated email address.

data.name: EmailTitlePasswordReset
data.value: Dash Password Reset Request

data.name: EmailTextPasswordReset
data.value:
A request to reset your password was received. You can reset your password here. This link is only valid for 15 minutes.

If you did not request this, you can ignore this email.

data.name: ForgotPassword
data.value: Forgot Password

data.name: ErrorInvalidUser
data.value: The user could not be found.

data.name: ErrorResetPassword
data.value: The password reset link you clicked has expired or is invalid. Please try again.

data.name: ResetPassword
data.value: Reset Password

data.name: ResetPasswordText
data.value: Use the form below to reset your password. Passwords must be at least 6 characters long, with at least one non-alphanumeric character.

data.name: ErrorSendingEmail
data.value: An error occurred sending the email.

data.name: UpdateAccount
data.value: Update Account

data.name: AccountUpdated
data.value: Your account was updated successfully. You will need to refresh this page if you changed your language.

data.name: ErrorFactorExpired
data.value: Two factor authentication must be completed within five minutes. Please try logging in again.

data.name: ErrorFactorInvalid
data.value: The code you entered was not correct.

data.name: TwoFactor
data.value: Two Factor Authentication

data.name: FactorText
data.value: To configure two factor authentication, you will need to install Google Authenticator on your mobile device. Once installed, use it to scan the QR code below. Then click `Done` to try logging in again.

data.name: Help
data.value: Help

data.name: ErrorAccountLocked
data.value: This account has been locked for {0} minutes because of too many failed login attempts.

data.value: Code
